phrs.translation: 夏尔, 希雷, 郡, 沙尔
塔里亚·希雷, 塔莉娅·夏尔, 泰莉亚雪儿
萨瑟兰郡, 修打兰市, 修打兰郡, 报道
因弗内斯郡, 因弗内斯, 尼斯郡

sentences.sentence: He is not the worst boy in the entire shire, but the cleverest and creative boy.
sentences.translation: 他不是整个郡里最坏的孩子，而是最聪明、最有创造力的孩子。

sentences.sentence: His father introduced Hill to his stepmother as he said, "Dear, I hope you notice in the entire shire this is the worst boy, who has made me have no other way."
sentences.translation: 他的父亲把希尔介绍给他的继母，并说：“亲爱的，我希望你能注意到整个郡的人都知道他是最坏的男孩，他让我束手无策。”

sentences.sentence: Pray, Miss Eliza, are not the ----shire militia removed from Meryton?
sentences.translation: 请问你，伊丽莎白小姐，麦里屯的民兵团不是开走了吗？
